list.abs: 10) The turtledove 斑鸠之歌 11) I have been walking the whole night 彻夜独徘徊 (Lyrics by unknown) Riccardo Piacentini 12) The Venetian 威尼斯人.
[转帖]最好与最差的奇幻小说 ... Harry Potter 哈利·波特 Harry Turtledove 哈利·托特达夫 Heirs of Alexandria 亚历山大的后裔.
阿西莫夫(Asimov)谈科幻小说写作 ... 作者是哈瑞 - 特妥斗夫( Harry Turtledove ) 有人有一次问艾萨克 - 牛顿(  Isaac Newton ).
and he said unto him , Take me an heifer of three a she goat of three a ram of three a turtledove a young pigeon .他说、你为我取一只三年的母牛、一只三年的母山羊、一只三年的公绵羊、一只斑鸠、一只雏鸽。
but you two turtledoves have no choice ., 但是你们俩个小朋友别无选择,
the eighth day he must take two turtledoves or two young pigeons and come before Yahweh at the entrance to the Tent of Meeting , and give to the priest .到第八天，应拿两只斑鸠或两只雏鸽，来到上主面前，在会幕门口，交给司祭。

auth_sentence.content: The turtledoves were wedded within a week.
auth_sentence.res_content: The turtledoves were wedded within a week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The turtledoves were wedded within a week.
